description: {x
{rOnce a booming and lucrative storage business, this warehouse
{rstands in shambles.  Ages old machines have been graffitied and
{rbroken beyond all repair.  Fine motes of dust rains from the
{rrafters, full of rust and pigeon dander.  The entire building
{rsmells musty, but footprints in the floor testify to its continued
{ruse...{x
2124.name: {rOl{8d Ab{randon{8e{rd Wa{8r{rehouse{x

description: {x
{8The back room of Vaprak's Tankard is nothing more than the
{8area where the hooch is made.  Crude bottles and hoses line
{8the walls, creating what passes for alcohol in this joint.
{8Sanitary conditions are a wish and a dream as rats scurry
{8in and out of the sacks of grain, eating their fill and
{8defecating just as much.{x
2170.name: {gV{ya{Gp{8ra{gk's T{Ga{8nka{yr{gd {w- {8Hooch Room{x

description: {x
Once, in the history of this neighborhood, plans were made to
build a tenement of considerable size, but when the gangs took
over, those plans were abandoned.  Now, the lot stands choked
with weeds, mounds of dirt, and the random couch with springs
exposed.  Used condoms lay about, competing for space with the
broken glass and garbage strewn everywhere.
2109.name: Overgrown Lot

description: {X
It is the place no respectable citizen wants to be, especially at
night.  This large stretch of dirty land is the place between the
territories of the Troll and Ogre gangs.  It is full of trash and
shattered glass along with rotted out furniture.
2139.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {X
Achilles Avenue runs north and south here, nothing more than
a narrow road - a remnant of what this nice neighborhood might
have once become.  Run down buildings littered with graffiti
flank the sides of the street, their windows broken or boarded.
2163.name: {YA{ych{8ill{yes A{Yv{8en{yue{x

description: {x
Solomon Street runs east to west, while at this T-shaped
intersection, Achilles heads north.  To the south is a
low brick wall that gives a glimpse of the forests that
lay beyond Westbridge proper.  Trash lines the street.
2167.name: {BThe Intersection of {YA{ych{8ill{yes {Band {RSo{rl{8om{ron{x

description: {x
The bashed down wall of the armory can be seen to the north,
a tumble of bricks pouring forth from the hole there.  To the
west is Dracolich Plaza, which appears to be a sad excuse for
a plaza indeed.  The shortcut continues south, littered with
glass and trash.
2117.name: A Shortcut by the Armory

description: {x
Gangland's most notorious spot for fights is here, No Man's Land.
Fresh blood is delivered daily with the amount of fights, and the
dirt is absolutely laden with shards of glass, broken knives, and
litter.  Weeds rise up everywhere, their thorns catching robes and
scratching exposed flesh.
2132.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {x
A wrought iron fence blocks off an old building that sits
to the north along Solomon Street as it runs east to west.
To the south is a half wall, giving a view of the forest
beyond.  The street is here made of brick, but only a few
of them survive, having been pulled from the ground and
used as weapons...
2168.name: {RSo{rl{8om{ron St{8re{Re{rt{x

description: {x
Yellow Dragon Road ends here at a small half wall.  To the
west can be glimpsed the backs of buildings in Westbridge,
while to the south stretches a large swatch of garbage filled
dirt chocked with weeds.
2126.name: {YYe{yll{8ow {yDra{Ygon R{8oa{yd{x

description: {x
At least, what used to be the armory.  All the equipment and weapons
that once lined the walls has all been stolen or broken beyond repair.
The back wall of the building has been bashed down, making this place
more of a tunnel than a true building.  White Dragon Boulevard is
north.
2111.name: The Armory

description: {x
Ajax and Solomon Streets come together here at the back
door of the local pub.  All around, buildings are in utter
shambles, and the roads go without any maintenance that
might keep them in use.  Trash and rubble piles are left
everywhere.
2169.name: {BThe Corner of {GA{gjax {Band {RSo{rl{8om{ron{x

description: {x
{8No Man's Land is for Trollz.  If you caut there,
you die!{x
{x
Looking through the window, you see a gang leader plotting the demise of
the ogres.
{x
Yellow Dragon Road runs east and west here, flanked by a brick
building to the north, and a large dirt field to the south.  The
road itself is narrow and filled with garbage and dead weeds.
On the side of the building to the north is a graffitied sign.
2129.name: {YYe{yll{8ow {yDra{Ygon R{8oa{yd{x

description: {x
The houses sag as they slowly decompose alongside White Dragon
Boulevard.  To the south, one of the many shops has succumbed to
the ravages of time, blocking of what once was Black Dragon
Boulevard.  The cracked cobblestones of the road continues east
and west.
2105.name: {WW{wh{Wi{8te {WD{wr{Wa{8g{Wo{wn {WB{wo{Wu{wl{We{8va{wr{Wd{x

description: {x
Yellow Dragon Road, a narrow strip of broken cobblestones,
runs east and west from here.  To the north is Ice Dragon
Way, while south is a large dirt field completely littered
with garbage and weeds.
2127.name: {YYe{yll{8ow {yDra{Ygon R{8oa{yd{x

description: {X
Bronze Dragon Street continues running north and south, flanked
to the west by a looming brick wall that is coated with graffiti.
The cobblestones that once graced the roads are interspersed with
shards of glass, dried blood, and weeds.  The stench of drunken
Troll piss fills the air.
2120.name: {yBr{Yo{ynz{Ye D{yra{8go{yn S{8tr{Ye{yet{x

description: {x
This looks like it was once the way to a beautiful home, but the
only thing left now are the stairs that once led up to the front
door.  The home itself is nowhere to be found, likely bulldozed
and scrapped.  Remnants of a garden reside here now, overgrown
and choked with thorny weeds.
2123.name: {8Abandoned Courtyard{x

description: {x
The shortcut here is nothing more than what appears to be a
walkway full of trash, broken glass, and walls that are coated
with graffiti.  To the east Ice Dragon Way can be seen, a sad
excuse for a road that may once have been grand.
2121.name: A Shortcut

description: {x
{*"{GTrollz suk cock!{8"
{x
{x
South Street ends and becomes something much more forgotten.
This run-down neighborhood is obviously crime ridden and is
apparent almost immediately by the sudden appearance of
graffiti on the walls.  The transition is startling and
very sudden...
2160.name: End of {rS{Rout{rh {GS{gtreet{x

description: {x
Ajax Street curves here, bending away from the towering brick
wall that sits to the east.  Several old and dilapidated shops
sit along the side of the road, their windows either knocked
out or boarded up and covered with graffiti.
2159.name: {GA{gjax {GS{8tr{geet{x

description: {x
Fresh violence is in evidence by the puddles of blood that lay
on the ground.  Amongst the overgrown weeds on the road, broken
sticks and abandoned knives are strewn recklessly.  White Draon
Boulevard stretches sadly to the east and west.
2103.name: {WW{wh{Wi{8te {WD{wr{Wa{8g{Wo{wn {WB{wo{Wu{wl{We{8va{wr{Wd{x

description: {x
The long stretch of dirt extends here, full of garbage and glittering
with the shimmer of shattered glass.  Rotted out couches occasionally
can be seen, along with used condoms and needles.  Dried puddles of
blood are everywhere, constantly growing in number.
2138.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {x
Sandwiched between the two territories is a stretch of abandoned
land called, "No Man's Land."  Here, broken and shattered bottles
lay on the ground alongside drying pools of blood and used needles.
It is probably not a good idea to be here after dark...
2137.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {x
{rThe warehouse offices are here in this rundown hallway.  Papers
{rlay strewn about on the ground as if no one could have been the
{rleast bit bothered to pack them up, or perhaps they were in a
{rhurry...  A staircase leads upward and one also leads down.{x
2172.name: {rOl{8d Ab{randon{8e{rd Wa{8r{rehouse{x

description: {x
{8"{RRaff Rules!{8"{x
{x
{x
Coffin Street abruptly ends to the west, the cobblestones that are
kept clean becoming overgrown with weeds and strewn with cracks.
White Dragon Boulevard doesn't seem like it's ever seen better days.
On the ramshackle and run down houses, graffiti sprawls in both
chunky, artistic letters, and in simple tags.
2101.name: {WW{wh{Wi{8te {WD{wr{Wa{8g{Wo{wn {WB{wo{Wu{wl{We{8va{wr{Wd{x

description: {x
Alexander Street runs east and west here, flanked by houses
and shops that are run down, abandoned, or completely collapsed.
Graffiti scrawls across it all, competing with the shattered
glass and trash that fills the street.  It seems that lawlessness
rules this part of town.
2161.name: {MAl{mexan{8de{mr St{Mr{8e{met{x

description: {x
This had to obviously be one of the first places
hit when the violence between the gangs erupted.
Jewelry cases are graffitied and obliterated, laying
in pieces on the floor.  The building itself is in a
sorry state, looking as though it could collapse at
any given moment.
2144.name: Abandoned Jewelry Shop

description: {x
Ice Dragon Way is a much narrower road than White Dragon
Boulevard, but what was once a proud little road in the
neighborhood is in shambles.  Beautiful crystal sculptures
that once lined the way are nothing more than shards on
the ground, some of which appear to have been used in fights.
2113.name: {CI{cc{We {CD{cr{8a{Wg{co{Cn {8W{Ca{Wy{x

description: {x
Once the center of town, Achilles Avenue ends here at
a long stretch of dirt known as No Man's Land.  To the
south the street continues along, while to the west is
Hector Street.
2147.name: {YA{ych{8ill{yes A{Yv{8en{yue{x

description: {x
Smack between the territories of the Troll and Ogre gangs is No
Man's Land.  It is nothing more than a large stretch of dirt
once planned for development.  The danger is being found here at
night, when the destitute land is overrun with gang activity.
2136.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {x
Bronze Dragon Street stretches to the north, flanked on the west
by a tall brick wall covered with graffiti.  The rancid smell of
Troll piss fills the air and the ground is littered with glass and
discarded knives.  To the west is what appears to be an abandoned
warehouse, while south is Yellow Dragon Road.
2125.name: {yBr{Yo{ynz{Ye D{yra{8go{yn S{8tr{Ye{yet{x

description: {x
{8"{BF intl  's Mag c Sho ppe{8"{x
{x
{x
Bronze Dragon Street runs north and south alongside a looming
brick wall completely covered over in graffiti.  To the west
is a magic shop, evidenced by the sign that hangs there with
missing letters.  The cobblestone road is littered with trash.
2115.name: {yBr{Yo{ynz{Ye D{yra{8go{yn S{8tr{Ye{yet{x

description: {x
{8Once a beautiful temple, this small chapel is desecrated with
{8the graffiti of the Ogre gang.  It smells horrible, like body
{8odor and piss, and every square inch of the floor seems covered
{8in glass or broken seats or statues that have been ripped from
{8their bases to be smashed upon the floor.  A stairwell leads
{8down to the lower level of the pitiful temple remains.{x
2148.name: {8Sm{wal{8l Rui{wn{8ed Cha{wp{8el{x

description: {x
A secret workplace covered in a light layer of dust lies below the
rubble of the deserted shop above with living quarters improvised
near the rear of the room.  A forge silently burns behind a very
obvious magical cone of silence.
2171.name: Basement of an Old Weaponshop

description: {x
Hector Street feels more like an alley with all the trash that
clutters its way.  Glittering shards of glass lay strewn about,
competing with the thorny weeds that grow up from the cracks in
the ground.  An abandoned building sits to the west.
2146.name: {8He{wct{8or St{8re{8et{x

description: {x
Grass honestly attempts to grow here between the throngs
of garbage and litter, broken bottles, used condoms, and
weeds.  At the center of the "park" is a crudely created
statue of the Mongol warrior, Kahn, created with airship
engine pieces and various found items from the surrounding
houses.  A couple of benches still remain in tact, covered
with graffiti.
2155.name: {RKh{ra{Rn P{ra{Rrk{X

description: {x
{*"{YTrollz Rul!  Ogrs Bewayr!{8"
{x
{x
White Dragon Boulevard thankfully comes to an end here at a
tall brick wall covered in graffiti.  To the south stretches
Bronze Dragon Street, which appears to have fared no better
than any other street in this neighborhood.  Empty beer bottles
and shards of glass glitter on the road, mingled with dried
up pools of blood.
2108.name: {BCorner of {yBr{Yo{ynz{Ye {Band {WW{wh{Wi{8te {WD{wr{Wa{8g{Wo{wn{x

description: {x
Ice Dragon Way bends to the east and south here, the shards of
crystal statues litter the overgrown and cracked cobblestones
and make walking precarious.  A fresh pool of blood lays on the
ground, slowly drying.  Along the sides of the way, old houses
decay into old age, boarded up and graffitied all over.
2112.name: {CI{cc{We {CD{cr{8a{Wg{co{Cn {8B{ce{Wn{Cd{x

description: {x
This large stretch of dirt appears to have been a place where
development was planned, but never executed.  Weeds grow in
tangles, catching garbage and hiding used needles.  This is the
battleground for the Troll and Ogre gang, evidenced by the blood...
2133.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {x
Ice Dragon Way continues to the north and south here, littered
with garbage and shards of crystal.  What used to be a beautiful
tree-lined way is now a row of decayed and dying homes.  Beer
bottles litter the ground along with discarded condoms and knives.
2118.name: {CI{cc{We {CD{cr{8a{Wg{co{Cn {8W{Ca{Wy{x

description: {x
The beauty of this neighborhood is long gone as more houses and
buildings lay in boarded up disuse.  Windows are broken out and
a musty smell comes from the slowly decaying homes.  To the south
a square brick building sits, the windows boarded but the door
open for use...
2104.name: {WW{wh{Wi{8te {WD{wr{Wa{8g{Wo{wn {WB{wo{Wu{wl{We{8va{wr{Wd{x

description: {x
{rThe stairway has landed here, in the cool basement levels of
{rthe old warehouse.  The smell of dank musty air is thick,
{ralong with the iron-laden scent of blood.  A table sits off
{rto the side with a deck of playing cards on its surface.{x
2173.name: {rTR{8O{RL{rL L{REA{rDER'{8S {rHID{RE{rOU{8T{r!{x

description: {x
Rumor has it that long ago this shop was owned by a kindly old
wizard who devoted his time to creating potions and scrolls.
On the rise of the gangs, the old wizard was slain and his nice
creations used for the good of the gang.  Now the building stinks
of piss and is covered in a thick coating of dust.  Everything
once within is gone or broken beyond recognition.
2114.name: Ramshackle Magic Shop

description: {x
Once a nice, lower-middleclass neighborhood, the troll gang rule
the streets here.  All the shops and homes have been boarded up,
left abandoned except for the one or two that serve as meth labs
and drug houses.  Even the police stay out of this section of town
for fear of being brutalized.
2102.name: {WW{wh{Wi{8te {WD{wr{Wa{8g{Wo{wn {WB{wo{Wu{wl{We{8va{wr{Wd{x

description: {8Once standing proud, these wrought iron gates lean back,
{8bending on their rusting hinges.{x
{x
Yellow Dragon Road runs east and west, a narrow strip of cobble-
stones overgrown with weeds and choked with garbage.  To the north
sits an open set of rusted gates leading to a courtyard, while to
the south is an open patch of dirty land.
2128.name: {YYe{yll{8ow {yDra{Ygon R{8oa{yd{x

description: {8Once standing proud, these wrought iron gates lean back,
{8bending on their rusting hinges.  A courtyard sits beyond.
{x
{x
Along Ajax Street, several walls of buildings long gone still
stand, imprints of staircases still visible against the fading
paint on the bricks.  To the south looks to be a run down hole
in the wall pub.  Ajax itself continues to the east and west.
2158.name: {GA{gjax {GS{8tr{geet{x

description: {x
Whatever was once here is now gone, anything that might have
resembled a road or a house has been long swallowed by the dirt
that is everywhere.  Weeds grow up from the ground like claws,
holding tightly to any garbage blowing by.  Shattered glass on
the ground sparkles in the light.  To the north is a way out...
2131.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {x
Alexander Street continues to the east and west, a narrow
street flanked with buildings that appear to be on their
way out.  Glass and dried blood puddles line the bricks
of the road, glittering like spilled stars from the skies.
2162.name: {MAl{mexan{8de{mr St{Mr{8e{met{x

description: {x
Ajax Street runs to the north and south alongside the tall brick
wall to the east.  Graffiti lines the wall with unknown layers of
paint, all warnings against being anywhere near this territory.
To the west is a building that appears abandoned and completely
run down.
2154.name: {GA{gjax {GS{8tr{geet{x

description: {x
Ice Dragon Way heads south from here, once lined with beautiful
crystal sculptures.  The road seems littered with shards of their
demise.  White Dragon Boulevard continues to the east and west,
desolate yet thoroughly coursing with gang activity.
2106.name: Corner of {CI{cc{We {Band {WW{wh{Wi{8te {WD{wr{Wa{8g{Wo{wn{x

description: {x
In the center of this intersection of roads stands a tall
statue depicting a battle between two combatants, one of
which looks like Nisstyre, the other so beaten as to be
undiscernible.  What is amazing is the fact the statue is
absolutely untouched - protected by some force of magic.
From here, Achilles Avenue runs east and south, Hector
Street runs north, while Alexander heads west.
2150.name: {BIntersection of {8He{wc{8tor{B, {MAl{mexan{8de{Mr{B, and {YA{ych{8ill{yes{x

description: {x
Ajax Street runs north and south alongside a long building
to the east, and an old building with a wrought iron fence
to the west.  Glass and trash fill the cobblestones along
the road, each cracked or missing and choked with weeds.
2164.name: {GA{gjax {GS{8tr{geet{x

description: {x
Once set to be a large tenement, this lot is nothing more than
a collection of junk littered with some very thorny weeds.  All
around, shattered glass lays in competition with garbage and
used condoms.   Here and there engine pieces lay on the ground.
2110.name: Overgrown Lot

description: {x
Yellow Dragon Street ends here at a looming brick wall.  To the
north, Bronze Dragon street begins, looking completely run down
and dirty.  To the south, a stretch of dirt field runs, partially
enclosed by a fence.  It appears just as dirty as the rest of
the decaying neighborhood.
2130.name: {YYe{yll{8ow {yDra{Ygon R{8oa{yd{x

description: {x
Like many of the buildings in this neighborhood, this one has
seen better days.  Dried blood and carnage is all over the walls,
which have been stripped bare of any useable furnishings.  The
weapons are all long gone, though footprints in the dust shows
that this place does get used...
2153.name: Remains of a Weaponshop

description: {x
Ajax Street ends here as to the north is the desolate stretch
of No Man's Land.  All along the eastern edge of the narrow
road rises a brick wall cutting everything in that direction
from view.  To the west is a heavily graffitied chapel.
2149.name: {GA{gjax {GS{8tr{geet{x

description: {x
Along this stretch of crumbling cobblestones and weeds, White Dragon
Boulevard meanders in front of what looks like a beautiful inn.  The
marble that once stood proudly at its front is broken, blocking any
hope of entering.  Old graffiti, coated with grime from the dust and
rain, looks more like a collection of artistic letters than any kind
of legible word.
2107.name: {WW{wh{Wi{8te {WD{wr{Wa{8g{Wo{wn {WB{wo{Wu{wl{We{8va{wr{Wd{x

description: {x
The wrought iron gates open to reveal a cemetery in complete
disrepair.  An aura of evil weaves between the broken and
shattered headstones.  Graffiti artists still have braved
the place, showering any available surface with paint.  A
set of stairs leads up to an old building, perhaps mausoleum.
2141.name: Abandoned Cemetery

description: {x
Ice Dragon Way continues north here, where to the south it joins
with an equally sad Yellow Dragon Road.  What was once a crystal-
lined road is now overgrown with weeds and strewn with the shattered
remains of the statues.  Houses sag beneath the weight of age,
destined to become ruins soon.
2122.name: {CI{cc{We {CD{cr{8a{Wg{co{Cn {8W{Ca{Wy{x

description: {x
Once a courtyard of a beautiful home, this courtyard is now
full of weeds and shattered bottles.  The stairway that once
led to a front door is spray painted with graffiti and bottles
sit on the stoop that leads nowhere.  The home that sat to the
east is completely gone, and the remnants of the garden that
once grew here is swallowed with weeds.
2119.name: {8Abandoned Courtyard{x

description: {x
{8Nothing but nothing has been touched in this building.  The
aura of evil radiates in this building, and the crypts that
line the walls have been broken open in places.  Not even the
gang members that paint the walls dare enter here.{x
2145.name: {8The A{wban{8doned Ma{wuso{8leum{x

description: {x
{gUn{yl{Gik{8e most buildings in this forsaken neighborhood, Vaprak's
{gTa{yn{Gka{8rd still stands and looks in relatively good shape.  Given
{gth{ya{Gt {8alcohol is freely made and served here, it stands to reason
{gwh{yy{G. {8 Dark wood lines the walls and several large, Ogre-sized
{gta{yb{Gle{8s stand on the floor.  A long bar, blackened with age and
{gci{yg{Gar{8ette tar sits along the east wall.{x
2165.name: {gV{ya{Gp{8ra{gk's T{Ga{8nka{yr{gd{x

description: {x
{8This part of the basement is unrecognizable from the upper
{8level and reaks of ogre and dog piss.  A card table sits off
{8in the corner, its leg propped up with sugar packets.  A
{8musty old couch lines the wall, sitting alongside an easy
{8chair that wears its stuffing on the outside.{x
2100.name: {8OG{WR{wE {8LE{WA{8DE{wR{8'S HID{WE{8O{wU{8T!{x

description: {x
Ajax Street curves south and east here.  A small, narrow
alley leads north.  To the west is what appears to be the
remains of a tunnel that has long collapsed under its own
weight.  Rubble sits there now, blocking off what may have
been.
2157.name: {GA{gjax {GS{8tr{geet{x

description: {x
Broken glass glitters like stars from the blood strewn land between
the territories of the gangs.  Whatever was going to be built here
was long ago abandoned and now only the weeds seem eager to emerge.
The lingering scent of piss can be detected here, strong and rank.
2134.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {x
The wrought iron gates open to reveal a cemetery in complete
disrepair.  Headstones are broken and shattered, those still
standing are awash with graffiti.  The grass grows in stark
competition with the weeds.  The whole place is filled with
an aura of evil.
2143.name: Abandoned Cemetery

description: {x
Hector Street runs to the east and west here.  To the north is
the dirty area of No Man's Land, notorious for gang violence
between the Trolls and Ogres.  To the east is the start of
Achilles Avenue, yet another street in a this run down, dead
section of town.
2142.name: {8He{wct{8or St{8re{8et{x

description: {x
Achilles Avenue runs east and west here, between a run
down house to the north, and an old building surrounded
by a wrought iron fence to the south.  It looks as though
it might have been a cemetery - though with the fact that
the dead haven't moved, perhaps it still is.
2151.name: {YA{ych{8ill{yes A{Yv{8en{yue{x

description: {x
{YHey, fukterd Trollz, you here tonite, you dead meat.{x
{x
{x
This huge expanse of dirt is laden with blood and broken glass.
Rotted out furniture can be found in some places, looking like
carcasses of long dead animals rising from the ground.  It is
advisable to avoid this place at night, as evidenced by the old
graffiti on the wall to the east...
2140.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {x
Achilles Avenue bends to the north and west here, though
a small passage between run down buildings opens to Ajax
Street to the south.  The bricks that made up the road
have all but vanished, leaving Achilles in this section
more of a dirt path than anything.
2152.name: {YA{ych{8ill{yes A{Yv{8en{yue{x

description: {x
Once a plaza surrounded by pleasant trees and benches, Dracolich
Plaza is run down, its benches broken and missing boards, and the
fountain, once bubbling with water, is shattered and dry.  The stones
on the ground are cracked and missing, filled with weeds and trash.
2116.name: {RDr{rac{8olich P{rla{Rza{x

description: {x
No Man's Land is nothing more than a huge expanse of dirt, filled
with litter and garbage and dried pools of blood.  It is a dangerous
place to be when the sun falls, for it is constantly at the center
of gang violence.  A tall wall rises to the east, blocking off any
view of the Haon'Dor beyond and keeping the violence contained.
2135.name: {RNO MAN'S LAND{x

description: {x
Achilles Avenue runs north and south here, flanked with
dilapidated buildings and homes.  To the west is what
appears to pass for a park, though any good use it may
have done has long passed.
2156.name: {YA{ych{8ill{yes A{Yv{8en{yue{x

description: {x
{rThis office is huge and overlooks the floors below.  Once,
{rit was probably used for ensuring everything was run with
{rprecision, but it is now filled with a dingy mattress and
{rempty alcohol bottles.  The windows have been smashed out,
{rleaving glass all over the old desk that sits here.{x

Solomon Street forms the southernmost boundary of the Ogre
gang's territory, separated from the forests beyond by a
low half wall.  Here at the end of the street, trash is
piled up, surrounded by glittering broken glass.

description:
She's a human woman who obviously can't get enough of big...
men.  She wears a tight, low-cut top that barely holds in
her breasts and hangs off her shoulders.  Her pants are so
tight she can barely walk, and her heels are at 5" platforms.
Her makeup is heavy and depending on the day and the date,
she can be seen wearing a troll jacket or an ogre jacket.
